description: soft-bound book with light blue cover; white label with black text on cover; inscription in black text inside cover; some text pages; images include:  aerial landscape views; children playing and women with baskets; group outdoors with men spreading cloths on the ground in a garden; swordsmen in armor fighting; street scene with men watching women playing shamisen; people viewing square pools of fish, attended by men with nets walking on planks; soldier on horseback with a large bow
marks:
Inscription and Stamp

inside cover, in black in
title: The Illustrated Famous Places in Settsu (Settsu Meisho Zue, Yatabe Gori), Volume 7
